name: Material Request Pending for Purchase Order
query:
select 
    mr.name as "MR No:Link/Material Request:120",
	mr.transaction_date as "MR Date:Date:80",
	mr.temp_cc as "Cost Center::150",
	mr_item.item_code as "Material Code:Link/Item:100",
	sum(ifnull(mr_item.qty, 0)) as "MR Qty:Float:100",
	sum(ifnull(mr_item.ordered_qty, 0)) as "PO Qty:Float:100", 
	(sum(mr_item.qty) - sum(ifnull(mr_item.ordered_qty, 0))) as "PO Pending:Float:100",
	mr_item.item_name as "Material Name::150",
	mr_item.description as "Material Description::200",
	mr.material_request_type as "Requisition Type::100"
	
from
	`tabMaterial Request` mr, `tabMaterial Request Item` mr_item
where
	mr_item.parent = mr.name
	and mr.material_request_type = "Purchase"
	and mr.docstatus = 1
	and mr.status != "Stopped"  
group by (CASE WHEN %(filter_by)s = "Item" THEN mr.name ELSE mr.name END), (CASE WHEN %(filter_by)s = "Item" THEN mr_item.item_code ELSE mr.name END)
having
	sum(ifnull(mr_item.ordered_qty, 0)) < sum(ifnull(mr_item.qty, 0))
order by mr.transaction_date asc
report_name: Material Request Pending for Purchase Order
